privacy_policy_html:
Privacy Policy

We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting it. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and disclose information that we obtain about visitors to our website. By using our website, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your information as described in this Privacy Policy.

Information We Collect

We collect various types of information from visitors to our website, including:

  • Contact information, such as your name, email address, and phone number, which you may provide when filling out a form on our website
  • Information about the rare and exclusive car(s) you are interested in purchasing
  • Information about your location, such as your IP address, which we may collect through cookies or other tracking technologies

How We Use Your Information

We may use your information for various purposes, including:

  • To provide you with information about the rare and exclusive car(s) you are interested in purchasing
  • To respond to your inquiries and provide customer support
  • To send you promotional materials and other communications related to our business
  • To analyze and improve our website and services

Disclosure of Your Information

We may disclose your information to third parties in certain circumstances, including:

  • To our business partners and service providers, such as payment processors and shipping companies, to facilitate transactions and provide services to you
  • To comply with applicable laws and regulations
  • In connection with a merger, acquisition, or other corporate transaction

Security of Your Information

We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, and use. However, we cannot guarantee the security of your information, and you should take steps to protect your own information when using our website.

Changes to this Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make material changes to this Privacy Policy, we will notify you by email or by posting a notice on our website. Your continued use of our website after any changes to this Privacy Policy will signify your acceptance of the changes.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us
user_agreement_html:
User Agreement

Please read this User Agreement carefully before using our website. By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of this User Agreement.

1. Use of Our Website

You may use our website for lawful purposes and in accordance with this User Agreement. You agree not to use our website:

  • In any way that violates any applicable federal, state, local or international law or regulation
  • To transmit, or procure the sending of, any advertising or promotional material without our prior written consent, including any 'junk mail', 'chain letter' or 'spam' or any other similar solicitation
  • To impersonate or attempt to impersonate us, our employees, another user or any other person or entity

2. Intellectual Property Rights

The content on our website, including without limitation, the text, graphics, photos, logos, and all other intellectual property, is our property or the property of our licensors and is protected by United States and international copyright laws.

3. Disclaimer of Warranties

Our website is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis. We make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, as to the operation of our website or the information, content, materials, or products included on our website.

4. Limitation of Liability

We will not be liable for any damages of any kind arising from the use of our website, including, but not limited to, direct, indirect, incidental, punitive, and consequential damages.

5. Indemnification

You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless us, our affiliates, officers, directors, employees, agents, and licensors from and against any and all claims, liabilities, damages, losses, costs, expenses, or fees (including reasonable attorneys' fees) arising from your use of our website or your breach of this User Agreement.

6. Governing Law

This User Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Kazakhstan, without giving effect to any principles of conflicts of law.

7. Changes to this User Agreement

We may revise this User Agreement at any time and without notice by updating this posting. Your continued use of our website after such modifications will constitute your acknowledgment of the modified User Agreement and your agreement to abide and be bound by the modified User Agreement.

8. Contact Us

If you have any questions or comments about this User Agreement, please contact us
